comments.body: The additional comma after the last attribute is no an issue?
Yes, as in the JMXTool java code I intentionally handles that part: https://github.com/apache/kafka/pull/4650/files#diff-096d07271294637c2e52b68dd1038c44R104

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +78,82 @@        cmd += " --attributes "
        for jmx_attribute in self.jmx_attributes:
            cmd += "%s," % jmx_attribute
        cmd += " 1>> %s" % self.jmx_tool_log
        cmd += " 2>> %s &" % self.jmx_tool_err_log
